name: Parse CREATE DDL (SQL)
description:
Will parse the FIELD, TYPE, and (optional) NULL tokens from a simple multi-line CREATE DDL.
Not perfect, but will do most of the work. You might need to format the DDL first.
content:
create table TEST_TABLE
(
  TEST1                    NUMBER(20) ,
  TEST_NOT_NULL              NUMBER(20) not null,
  TEST_COMP_TYPE    VARCHAR2(10 CHAR), 
  ANOTHER_TEST               VARCHAR2(300 BYTE)
, 
AMOUNT                          NUMBER(38,2)
, 
  TEST_LAST          VARCHAR2(20 BYTE)
)
author: raul
